Docs.summary: Provides extension methods for parse results.

Docs.param: The parse result to check for the presence of the option.
The option to check for the presence of.
Docs.summary: Indicates whether a given option is present in the parse result.
Docs.returns: if the option is present; otherwise, .
Docs.remarks: If the option has a default value defined, then will be returned.

Docs.param: A parse result on which the invocation is based.
A console to which output can be written. By default, is used.
Docs.summary: Invokes the appropriate command handler for a parsed command line input.
Docs.returns: A value that can be used as a process exit code.
